scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npx -p node@latest -- node node_modules/.bin/resume export dist/index.html --format html
scripts.release:major: ./node_modules/generate-changelog/bin/generate -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: ./node_modules/generate-changelog/bin/generate -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: ./node_modules/generate-changelog/bin/generate -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
